attributes.action: consider a Government backed pilot scheme for treating drug addiction and associated criminality:
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government  should: -

1.	Establish or utilize UK testing sites where heroin from police drug seizures could be tested.

2.	Enter into negotiations with appropriate overseas Governments to procure processed opium poppy extracts at a fair price to local farmers.

The prime aim of the pilot is to fight drug abuse in the UK and associated criminality. 

This pilot would also involve administering heroin free of charge by medical practitioners to registered UK addicts at licensed support units.

This initiative would help reduce the incidence of associated criminal supply and enable addicts to sign up to treatment plans.

Furthermore if the pilot proved  successful then it could be rolled out across the UK and also be used as good practice when combating other illegal drugs.
